name: after-you
effect: The target will act next this turn, regardless of Speed or move priority. If the target has already acted this turn, this move will fail.
short_effect: Makes the target act next this turn.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user helps the target and makes it use its move right after the user.
